description: Language service for CSS, LESS and SCSS
name: vscode-css-languageservice

scripts.compile: tsc -p ./src && npm run copy-jsbeautify && npm run lint
scripts.coverage: npm run compile && npx nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text  mocha
scripts.install-types-next: npm install vscode-languageserver-types@next -f -S && npm install vscode-languageserver-textdocument@next -f -S
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run compile-esm && npm run test && npm run remove-sourcemap-refs
